ygData.subject: Re: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! ... I had almost same problems in PK battles on Tallon Zek. Even over 15 min after battle game interface didnt function. I was able to walk using keyboard,
ygData.messageBody:
Hi!

> 3 of our casters, 2 clerics and 1 enchanter lost the ability to cast spells
> during the melee.
> I don't mean we were charmed or feared or roared. I mean, all spell and
> hotkey functions were gone, as if fear effect continued forever.
> We were forced to camp to clear effect.

I had almost same problems in PK battles on Tallon Zek. Even over 15 min
after battle game interface didnt function. I was able to walk using
keyboard, turn around with mouse, but no hotkey or spell were working.
Screen mode switching too, and i havnt been even able to camp because i
play in "full screen" mode and camp button was unreachable. That
happened to me 3 times, all times i was combating with necromancers and
enchanters. I believe problem is some enchanter spell, because i was
fighting with necros many times and only if enchanter was nearby i was
facing such problem. I was feared and charmed before and it never cause
me such problems, so single charm or fear is ok. Maybe some combo can
cause this, like fear+charm or fear+root or something like it. I believe
enchanter spell of 8-12 lvl is required to cause such problems, because
in fights against 20+ lvl enchanters i never experienced this problem,
only in fights with 8-12 lvl ones. BTW, my friend was in same situation
even more times than me, and he also crashed to Windows once, and once
was forced to reset his computer. We have written alot of petitions
about these bugs but none of them were answered.
